Introduction

Ryu Hwa Young is a South Korean singer and actress. She is best known for being a former member of the girl group T-ARA. In 2012 she left the group due to alleged bullying and discord with fellow members, which was eventually debunked in 2017. She has been acting in dramas and movies ever since.
